snippet: Mrs. Stevenson, a loyal daughter who followed the wishes of her father, Amon G. Carter Sr., built a museum of American art.
abstract: Ruth Carter Stevenson, creator of the Amon Carter Museum in Ft Worth, Tex, one of nation's pre-eminent collections of American art, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Stevenson, a loyal daughter who followed the wishes of her father, Amon G. Carter Sr., built a museum of American art.

headline.seo: Ruth Carter Stevenson of the Amon Carter Museum Dies at 89
headline.main: Ruth Carter Stevenson of the Amon Carter Museum Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Ruth Carter Stevenson, 89; Built Art Museum
